name: chatbotreport

scripts.pdfmac: pandoc --latex-engine=xelatex -H _config/preamble.tex -V fontsize=10pt -V documentclass:book -V papersize:a4paper -V classoption:openright --number-sections --bibliography=03_references/references.bib 00_front-material/*.md _config/toc.md 01_sections/*/*.md 02_appendices/*.md 03_references/references.md -o ChatBotDevelopment.pdf

author: Daire Homan, Brian Kelly, Aaron Ward
